item.title:
Anyone know the best way to convert vol surface implied vols to the implied one touch probability of any price along that curve?
Vanilla vols to barrier vols basically

item.title:
R to @quant_arb: Like you’re telling me you can’t just remember
Sharpe = annualize(return - rfr / stddev)
That said… seen a few people not even remember the part where you annualise it
item.dc:creator: @quant_arb
item.description:
Like you’re telling me you can’t just remember

Sharpe = annualize(return - rfr / stddev)

That said… seen a few people not even remember the part where you annualise it

item.title:
Sometimes I’m reminded of that quant cheat sheet from pyquantnews where it was literally the Sharpe ratio formula.
If you need that you’re definitely NGMI
Feels equivalent to watching business majors write down “profit = revenue - costs” intensely
item.dc:creator: @quant_arb
item.description:
Sometimes I’m reminded of that quant cheat sheet from pyquantnews where it was literally the Sharpe ratio formula.

If you need that you’re definitely NGMI

item.title: R to @quant_arb: Citadel is still a serious player, but I don't think their track record in crypto or entering other markets hints that they are so unimaginably skilled that they'll cause some materially different impact than all these other tradfi shops joining/ that have joined.
item.dc:creator: @quant_arb
item.description: Citadel is still a serious player, but I don't think their track record in crypto or entering other markets hints that they are so unimaginably skilled that they'll cause some materially different impact than all these other tradfi shops joining/ that have joined.

item.title: R to @quant_arb: And I will add that from speaking with friends at Citsec last time they entered the space - it was a total mess and what they could trade was v restricted. Not to mention the 100s of millions they lost trying and failing to break into FX ...
item.dc:creator: @quant_arb
item.description: And I will add that from speaking with friends at Citsec last time they entered the space - it was a total mess and what they could trade was v restricted. Not to mention the 100s of millions they lost trying and failing to break into FX ...

item.title: R to @quant_arb: The market is changing, there are definitely some serious players now, but the impact of Citadel will likely be no different than the 10+ other serious tradfi shops that have joined crypto already ...
item.dc:creator: @quant_arb
item.description: The market is changing, there are definitely some serious players now, but the impact of Citadel will likely be no different than the 10+ other serious tradfi shops that have joined crypto already ...

item.title: The truth here is that MLP, Jump, PDT, IMC, and quite a few others are all already in the space and CitSec isn't this wonder firm that somehow changes things in a way these haven't ...
item.dc:creator: @quant_arb
item.description:

item.title:
